title: Installation issue: spfft
body:
While building the spfft, I received the following error message. 


---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install spfft 
==> Installing spfft
==> Searching for binary cache of spfft
==> No binary for spfft found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://github.com/eth-cscs/SpFFT/archive/v0.9.8.zip
  -#O=-#   #    #                                                                          
==> Staging archive: /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/v0.9.8.zip
==> Created stage in /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7
==> No patches needed for spfft
==> Building spfft [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

11 errors found in build log:
     54    [ 64%] Building CXX object src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/spfft/grid.cpp.o
     55    cd /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps
           6ux7/spack-build/src && /home/junmian/Applications/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  
           -Dspfft_EXPORTS -I/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsi
           kj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/ext -I/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0
           .9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/include -I/tmp/junmian/spack-sta
           ge/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/src -I/tmp
           /junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/sp
           ack-build -isystem /home/junmian/Applications/openmpi/openmpi-4.0.2-cuda/include
             -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden   -pthread 
           -fopenmp -std=gnu++11 -o CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/spfft/grid.cpp.o -c /tmp/junmian/s
           pack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/sr
           c/spfft/grid.cpp
     56    [ 71%] Building CXX object src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/spfft/grid_internal.cpp.o
     57    cd /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps
           6ux7/spack-build/src && /home/junmian/Applications/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  
           -Dspfft_EXPORTS -I/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsi
           kj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/ext -I/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0
           .9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/include -I/tmp/junmian/spack-sta
           ge/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-src/src -I/tmp
           /junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/sp
           ack-build -isystem /home/junmian/Applications/openmpi/openmpi-4.0.2-cuda/include
             -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden   -pthread 
           -fopenmp -std=gnu++11 -o CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/spfft/grid_internal.cpp.o -c /tmp/
           junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spa
           ck-src/src/spfft/grid_internal.cpp
     58    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/execution/execution_host.cpp: In instantiation of 'spfft::Execut
           ionHost<T>::ExecutionHost(int, std::shared_ptr<spfft::Parameters>, spfft::HostAr
           ray<std::complex<_Tp> >&, spfft::HostArray<std::complex<_Tp> >&) [with T = doubl
           e]':
     59    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/execution/execution_host.cpp:360:16:   required from here
  >> 60    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/execution/execution_host.cpp:55:87: error: array must be initial
           ized with a brace-enclosed initializer
     61               1.0 / static_cast<double>(param->dim_x() * param->dim_y() * param->di
           m_z()))) {
     62                                                                                    
    ... 
  >> 81    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/memory/host_array_view.hpp:99:3: error: array must be initialize
           d with a brace-enclosed initializer
     82       HostArrayView2D() = default;
     83       ^
  >> 84    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/memory/host_array_view.hpp:99:3: error: too many initializers fo
           r 'std::array<long long unsigned int, 2ul>'
     85    /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux
           7/spack-src/src/execution/execution_host.cpp:55:87: note: synthesized method 'sp
           fft::HostArrayView2D<T>::HostArrayView2D() [with T = std::complex<double>]' firs
           t required here
     86               1.0 / static_cast<double>(param->dim_x() * param->dim_y() * param->di
           m_z()))) {
     87                                                                                    
                  ^
     88    src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/build.make:117: recipe for target 'src/CMakeFiles/spfft
           .dir/execution/execution_host.cpp.o' failed
  >> 89    make[2]: *** [src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/execution/execution_host.cpp.o] Error 1
     90    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     91    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6
           uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-build'
     92    CMakeFiles/Makefile2:96: recipe for target 'src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/all' failed
  >> 93    make[1]: *** [src/CMakeFiles/spfft.dir/all] Error 2
     94    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6
           uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-build'
     95    Makefile:132: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 96    make: *** [all] Error 2`

See build log for details:
  /tmp/junmian/spack-stage/spack-stage-spfft-0.9.8-ce6uhekrj4fsikj4ymzoo76rvbps6ux7/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here: 
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux computer 4.15.0-74-generic #83~16.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Wed Dec 18 04:56:23 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
``` 
### Additional Information
The package was compiled by gcc@5.4.0, and I tried to install several different versions, including spfft 9.9, 9.8. All produce the same error message.
